name: Prologic
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: prologic
Developer Terms of Use
des: prologic - is to be used with Echo within Prologic Technologies office locations to assist any visitor at our office reception. This virtual assistant will greet visitors and ask them their purpose of visit. Then accordingly a SLACK a text message (by invoking Slack API with Lambda function) will be sent to the concerned person describing the visitor’s name and purpose of visit. Visitor will also be informed to take a seat and wait for the person to attend him/ her.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
